Html:
I dont know if this has been suggested before, but I was wondering if you'd considered making a similar program for Restoration or Moonkin? This said, it could also be ported to other classes still.

Im pretty sure you'd want to get the cat/bear one finished and perfect before starting anything else, but I thought I'd suggest it anyways.

They're all already in progress. :)

Bear, Cat, Warlock, Rogue, Hunter, Protadin, Moonkin, Mage, ProtWarr, Tree.

Sweet :) I look forward to seeing them :D

Also, if you need any graphics done, I'd be willing to help. I have no C# experience though :P
